Package com.bitsavior.map

Class Environment

java.lang.Object
com.bitsavior.map.Environment
public class Environment
extends java.lang.Object
handles the lights in the scene including positioning of the lighted objects

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2[] lightPositions
    list of the positions of the lights
    private java.util.ArrayList<LightedEntity> lights
    list of all lighted objects
    private int NumberOfLights
    number of lights in the scene
    private SoundEffect sirene
    soundeffect for the light objects
    private Watch soundTimer
    timer for the sound effect
    private LightedEntity.EffectType standardEffect
    standard effect, if no other is set
    private Watch timer
    timer to set a effect for a limited time

  • Constructor Summary

    Environment​(com.badlogic.gdx.assets.AssetManager manager)
    constructor creates the lighted entities and fills the positions into the array
